name: code-rpc
description: Bring your coding activity to Discord through Rich Presence.
author: mattiacerutti

code-rpc.settings.disconnectOnIdle.description: Disconnect from Discord RPC when idle. Once no more idle, it will reconnect automatically.

code-rpc.settings.retryConnection.description: Automatically try to reconnect to Discord RPC for 2 minutes if no connection is established.

code-rpc.settings.idleTimeout.description: The timeout in seconds to consider the user as idle.

code-rpc.settings.resetElapsedTimeOnIdle.description: When the user goes in or out of idle, the elapsed time will be reset.

code-rpc.images.idleImage.description: The image to use when the user is idle.

code-rpc.images.debuggingImage.description: The image to use when the user is debugging.

code-rpc.images.placeholderImage.description: The image to use when the user is not in a file, workspace or debugging.

code-rpc.images.languageImageTemplate.description: The template to use to get the language image. The {{language}} will be replaced with the language name found in the languages JSON file.

code-rpc.images.ideImageTemplate.description: The template to use to get the IDE image. The {{ide}} will be replaced with the IDE name found in the ide JSON file.

upperText.description: The upper text to use when the user is in a file but no workspace is open.

lowerText.description: The lower text to use when the user is in a file but no workspace is open.

imageText.description: The text displayed when hovering over the large image when the user is in a file but no workspace is open.

upperText.description: The upper text to use when the user is in a file.

lowerText.description: The lower text to use when the user is in a file.

imageText.description: The text displayed when hovering over the large image when the user is in a file.

upperText.description: The upper text to use when the user is not in a file (but still in a workspace).

lowerText.description: The lower text to use when the user is not in a file (but still in a workspace).

imageText.description: The text displayed when hovering over the large image when the user is not in a file (but still in a workspace).

upperText.description: The upper text to use when the user is not in a file or workspace.

lowerText.description: The lower text to use when the user is not in a file or workspace.

imageText.description: The text displayed when hovering over the large image when the user is not in a file or workspace.

upperText.description: The upper text to use when the user is debugging.

lowerText.description: The lower text to use when the user is debugging.

imageText.description: The text displayed when hovering over the large image when the user is debugging.

upperText.description: The upper text to use when the user is idle.

lowerText.description: The lower text to use when the user is idle.

imageText.description: The text displayed when hovering over the large image when the user is idle.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
